unnormalised: The UIDAI has urged citizens to update their Aadhaar details every 10 years. This helps maintain accuracy and ensures seamless access to govt. services. Failing to update may lead to delays or complications in availing benefits tied to your Aadhaar no.
normalised: The U-I-D-A-I has urged citizens to update their Aadhaar details every ten years. This helps maintain accuracy and ensures seamless access to government services. Failing to update may lead to delays or complications in availing benefits tied to your Aadhaar number.

unnormalised: Aadhaar, a 12-digit unique identifier issued by the Indian government, serves as a crucial document for various purposes. It's linked to your biometric data and residential address. Several govt schemes now mandate Aadhaar verification, so an accurate, up-to-date Aadhaar card is super important. Remember to keep copies safely and report any loss or misuse immediately.
normalised: Aadhaar, a twelve-digit unique identifier issued by the Indian government, serves as a crucial document for various purposes. It's linked to your biometric data and residential address. Several government schemes now mandate Aadhaar verification, so an accurate, up-to-date Aadhaar card is super important. Remember to keep copies safely and report any loss or misuse immediately.

unnormalised: You can update your address, mobile no., email ID, etc. through the UIDAI portal or by visiting an Aadhaar Kendra. Required documents may include your PAN card, voter ID, or passport. The process is generally straightforward, but it's best to prepone your visit rather than wait till the last minute!
normalised: You can update your address, mobile number, email I-D, etcetera, through the U-I-D-A-I portal or by visiting an Aadhaar Kendra. Required documents may include your P-A-N card, voter I-D, or passport. The process is generally straightforward, but it's best to prepone your visit rather than wait till the last minute!

unnormalised: The UIDAI encourages all citizens to check their Aadhaar status online regularly. You can also download the mAadhaar app for easy access to your digital Aadhaar card. Ensuring your Aadhaar info is accurate, current, and secure is a key responsibility. The Voter ID no. can also be linked to Aadhaar now for enhanced security.
normalised: The U-I-D-A-I encourages all citizens to check their Aadhaar status online regularly. You can also download the mAadhaar app for easy access to your digital Aadhaar card. Ensuring your Aadhaar info is accurate, current, and secure is a key responsibility. The Voter I-D number can also be linked to Aadhaar now for enhanced security.
